sqoop.arg: SELECT _SP_PalletLabelID,PalletID,MachineStage,PartNumber,InvState,PalletNo,CreatedDT,CompleteDT,Quantity,LabelTemplate,PrinterURL,PrintedDT,ScannedDT,IsCancelled,IsReprint,PartDescription,LabelSaveDirectory,IsPrintLandscape,NoCopies,LabelsPerInventoryPack, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo._SP_PalletLabel WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( _SP_PalletLabelID ${lessThanEqual} ${job_MEXICALI_OWNER__SP_PalletLabel_MaxBaseID} ) AND ( ${job_MEXICALI_OWNER__SP_PalletLabel_MinBaseID} ${lessThanEqual} _SP_PalletLabelID )

SELECT _SP_PalletLabelID,PalletID,MachineStage,PartNumber,InvState,PalletNo,CreatedDT,CompleteDT,Quantity,LabelTemplate,PrinterURL,PrintedDT,ScannedDT,IsCancelled,IsReprint,PartDescription,LabelSaveDirectory,IsPrintLandscape,NoCopies,LabelsPerInventoryPack, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo._SP_PalletLabel WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( _SP_PalletLabelID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_MEXICALI_OWNER__SP_PalletLabel_MinDeltaID} )

SELECT _SP_PalletLabelID,PalletID,MachineStage,PartNumber,InvState,PalletNo,CreatedDT,CompleteDT,Quantity,LabelTemplate,PrinterURL,PrintedDT,ScannedDT,IsCancelled,IsReprint,PartDescription,LabelSaveDirectory,IsPrintLandscape,NoCopies,LabelsPerInventoryPack, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo._SP_PalletLabel WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( _SP_PalletLabelID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_MEXICALI_OWNER__SP_PalletLabel_MinIncrementID} ) AND ( ${job_MEXICALI_OWNER__SP_PalletLabel_MaxIncrementID} ${greaterThanEqual} _SP_PalletLabelID )

SELECT EBATriggerID,RfTriggerTypeID,ContextDictionary,TriggerOwnerID,CreateDT,ProcessedDT,RfWatchProcessStateID,Message,TotalTime,OracleInsertTime,OracleConnectionTime,OracleInsertStatement, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.EBATrigger WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( EBATriggerID ${lessThanEqual} ${job_SPMM_C1_OWNER_EBATrigger_MaxBaseID} ) AND ( ${job_SPMM_C1_OWNER_EBATrigger_MinBaseID} ${lessThanEqual} EBATriggerID )

SELECT EBATriggerID,RfTriggerTypeID,ContextDictionary,TriggerOwnerID,CreateDT,ProcessedDT,RfWatchProcessStateID,Message,TotalTime,OracleInsertTime,OracleConnectionTime,OracleInsertStatement, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.EBATrigger WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( EBATriggerID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_SPMM_C1_OWNER_EBATrigger_MinDeltaID} )

SELECT EBATriggerID,RfTriggerTypeID,ContextDictionary,TriggerOwnerID,CreateDT,ProcessedDT,RfWatchProcessStateID,Message,TotalTime,OracleInsertTime,OracleConnectionTime,OracleInsertStatement, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.EBATrigger WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( EBATriggerID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_SPMM_C1_OWNER_EBATrigger_MinIncrementID} ) AND ( ${job_SPMM_C1_OWNER_EBATrigger_MaxIncrementID} ${greaterThanEqual} EBATriggerID )

SELECT InvChangeStateID,InventoryPackID,FromDT,ToDT,InvIsolatedReasonID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,OriginalLoginID,EditedInvChangeStateID,InvStateID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" , (DatePart(HOUR,InvChangeState.FromDT)) as "Trans_Hours" , (case when DatePart(HOUR,InvChangeState.FromDT) ${lessThan} 7 then cast(convert(char(11), InvChangeState.FromDT, 113) as datetime) -1 else cast(convert(char(11), InvChangeState.FromDT, 113) as datetime) end) as "ShiftStart_DateTime" FROM dbo.InvChangeState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( InvChangeStateID ${lessThanEqual} ${job_CAPETOWN_OWNER_InvChangeState_MaxBaseID} ) AND ( ${job_CAPETOWN_OWNER_InvChangeState_MinBaseID} ${lessThanEqual} InvChangeStateID )

SELECT InvChangeStateID,InventoryPackID,FromDT,ToDT,InvIsolatedReasonID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,OriginalLoginID,EditedInvChangeStateID,InvStateID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" , (DatePart(HOUR,InvChangeState.FromDT)) as "Trans_Hours" , (case when DatePart(HOUR,InvChangeState.FromDT) ${lessThan} 7 then cast(convert(char(11), InvChangeState.FromDT, 113) as datetime) -1 else cast(convert(char(11), InvChangeState.FromDT, 113) as datetime) end) as "ShiftStart_DateTime" FROM dbo.InvChangeState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( InvChangeStateID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_CAPETOWN_OWNER_InvChangeState_MinDeltaID} )

SELECT InvChangeStateID,InventoryPackID,FromDT,ToDT,InvIsolatedReasonID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,IsEdited,RevisionNo,OriginalLoginID,EditedInvChangeStateID,InvStateID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" , (DatePart(HOUR,InvChangeState.FromDT)) as "Trans_Hours" , (case when DatePart(HOUR,InvChangeState.FromDT) ${lessThan} 7 then cast(convert(char(11), InvChangeState.FromDT, 113) as datetime) -1 else cast(convert(char(11), InvChangeState.FromDT, 113) as datetime) end) as "ShiftStart_DateTime" FROM dbo.InvChangeState WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( InvChangeStateID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_CAPETOWN_OWNER_InvChangeState_MinIncrementID} ) AND ( ${job_CAPETOWN_OWNER_InvChangeState_MaxIncrementID} ${greaterThanEqual} InvChangeStateID )

SELECT LineInfoID,CellsProduced, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineInfo_custom WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( LineInfoID ${lessThanEqual} ${job_MEXICALI_OWNER_LineInfo_custom_MaxBaseID} ) AND ( ${job_MEXICALI_OWNER_LineInfo_custom_MinBaseID} ${lessThanEqual} LineInfoID )

SELECT LineInfoID,CellsProduced, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineInfo_custom WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( LineInfoID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_MEXICALI_OWNER_LineInfo_custom_MinDeltaID} )

SELECT LineInfoID,CellsProduced, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineInfo_custom WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( LineInfoID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_MEXICALI_OWNER_LineInfo_custom_MinIncrementID} ) AND ( ${job_MEXICALI_OWNER_LineInfo_custom_MaxIncrementID} ${greaterThanEqual} LineInfoID )

SELECT LkShiftMachineStageID,MachineStageID,ShiftID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKShiftMachineStage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( LkShiftMachineStageID ${lessThanEqual} ${job_DEVERN_OWNER_LKShiftMachineStage_MaxBaseID} ) AND ( ${job_DEVERN_OWNER_LKShiftMachineStage_MinBaseID} ${lessThanEqual} LkShiftMachineStageID )

SELECT LkShiftMachineStageID,MachineStageID,ShiftID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKShiftMachineStage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( LkShiftMachineStageID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_DEVERN_OWNER_LKShiftMachineStage_MinDeltaID} )

SELECT LkShiftMachineStageID,MachineStageID,ShiftID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKShiftMachineStage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( LkShiftMachineStageID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_DEVERN_OWNER_LKShiftMachineStage_MinIncrementID} ) AND ( ${job_DEVERN_OWNER_LKShiftMachineStage_MaxIncrementID} ${greaterThanEqual} LkShiftMachineStageID )

SELECT MeasurementSetID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedMSID,ApprovalLoginID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSet_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( MeasurementSetID ${lessThanEqual} ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_MeasurementSet__MaxBaseID} ) AND ( ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_MeasurementSet__MinBaseID} ${lessThanEqual} MeasurementSetID )

SELECT MeasurementSetID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedMSID,ApprovalLoginID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSet_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( MeasurementSetID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_MeasurementSet__MinDeltaID} )

SELECT MeasurementSetID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedMSID,ApprovalLoginID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSet_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( MeasurementSetID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_MeasurementSet__MinIncrementID} ) AND ( ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_MeasurementSet__MaxIncrementID} ${greaterThanEqual} MeasurementSetID )

SELECT ProductionStopID,StopComments,StopLoginID,OpenedStopDT,SavedStopDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedProductionStopID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductionStop_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( ProductionStopID ${lessThanEqual} ${job_MEXICALI_OWNER_ProductionStop__MaxBaseID} ) AND ( ${job_MEXICALI_OWNER_ProductionStop__MinBaseID} ${lessThanEqual} ProductionStopID )

SELECT ProductionStopID,StopComments,StopLoginID,OpenedStopDT,SavedStopDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedProductionStopID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductionStop_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( ProductionStopID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_MEXICALI_OWNER_ProductionStop__MinDeltaID} )

SELECT ProductionStopID,StopComments,StopLoginID,OpenedStopDT,SavedStopDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedProductionStopID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductionStop_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( ProductionStopID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_MEXICALI_OWNER_ProductionStop__MinIncrementID} ) AND ( ${job_MEXICALI_OWNER_ProductionStop__MaxIncrementID} ${greaterThanEqual} ProductionStopID )

SELECT TagMSID,MeasurementSetID,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT,TagTreeNodeID,X,Y, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagMS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( TagMSID ${lessThanEqual} ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_TagMS_MaxBaseID} ) AND ( ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_TagMS_MinBaseID} ${lessThanEqual} TagMSID )

SELECT TagMSID,MeasurementSetID,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT,TagTreeNodeID,X,Y, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagMS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( TagMSID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_TagMS_MinDeltaID} )

SELECT TagMSID,MeasurementSetID,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT,TagTreeNodeID,X,Y, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagMS WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( TagMSID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_TagMS_MinIncrementID} ) AND ( ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_TagMS_MaxIncrementID} ${greaterThanEqual} TagMSID )

SELECT UnitCountID,CollectionQuantity,CollectionUnitID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedUnitCountID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitCount_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( UnitCountID ${lessThanEqual} ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_UnitCount__MaxBaseID} ) AND ( ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_UnitCount__MinBaseID} ${lessThanEqual} UnitCountID )

SELECT UnitCountID,CollectionQuantity,CollectionUnitID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedUnitCountID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitCount_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( UnitCountID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_UnitCount__MinDeltaID} )

SELECT UnitCountID,CollectionQuantity,CollectionUnitID,Comments,LoginID,OpenedDT,SavedDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedUnitCountID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitCount_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( UnitCountID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_UnitCount__MinIncrementID} ) AND ( ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_UnitCount__MaxIncrementID} ${greaterThanEqual} UnitCountID )

SELECT VarMeasurementPID,SpecID,MeasurementSetPID,Measurement,Ignored,VariableTypeID,ProductID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,DT,RfIsOSID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VarMeasurementP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( VarMeasurementPID ${lessThanEqual} ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_VarMeasurementP_MaxBaseID} ) AND ( ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_VarMeasurementP_MinBaseID} ${lessThanEqual} VarMeasurementPID )

SELECT VarMeasurementPID,SpecID,MeasurementSetPID,Measurement,Ignored,VariableTypeID,ProductID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,DT,RfIsOSID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VarMeasurementP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( VarMeasurementPID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_VarMeasurementP_MinDeltaID} )

SELECT VarMeasurementPID,SpecID,MeasurementSetPID,Measurement,Ignored,VariableTypeID,ProductID,HeadNo,SampleNo,PositionNo,DT,RfIsOSID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VarMeasurementP WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( VarMeasurementPID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_VarMeasurementP_MinIncrementID} ) AND ( ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_VarMeasurementP_MaxIncrementID} ${greaterThanEqual} VarMeasurementPID )

SELECT InventoryLabel.InventoryLabelID, InventoryLabel.MachineStage, InventoryLabel.PartNumber, InventoryLabel.PartType, InventoryLabel.QuantityOrdered, InventoryLabel.WONumber, InventoryLabel.InventoryPackNo, InventoryLabel.CreatedFromDT, InventoryLabel.Quantity, InventoryLabel.Unit, InventoryLabel.Line, InventoryLabel.LabelTemplate, InventoryLabel.LabelsPerInventoryPack, InventoryLabel.ItemsPerLayer, InventoryLabel.LayersPerInventoryPack, InventoryLabel.PrinterURL, InventoryLabel.PrintedDT, InventoryLabel.ItemsPerInventoryPack, InventoryLabel.ScannedDT, InventoryLabel.IsCancelled, InventoryLabel.OrderQuantityPacks, InventoryLabel.LineShortName, InventoryLabel.PackNo, InventoryLabel.IsReprint, InventoryLabel.PartDescription, InventoryLabel.LabelSaveDirectory, InventoryLabel.JobID, InventoryLabel.IsPrintLandscape, InventoryLabel.NoCopies, InventoryLabel_.LabelColour, InventoryLabel_.EANCode, InventoryLabel_.CusNum, InventoryLabel_.PackingCode, InventoryLabel_.CustomerPartNo, InventoryLabel_.CustomerPartDescription, InventoryLabel_.LabelText1, InventoryLabel_.LabelText2, InventoryLabel_.LabelText3, InventoryLabel_.Customer, InventoryLabel_.Address1, InventoryLabel_.Address2, InventoryLabel_.City, InventoryLabel_.County, InventoryLabel_.PostCode, InventoryLabel_.Country, InventoryLabel_custom.InventoryPackID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM InventoryLabel FULL JOIN InventoryLabel_ ON (InventoryLabel.InventoryLabelID = InventoryLabel_.InventoryLabelID) FULL JOIN InventoryLabel_custom ON (InventoryLabel.InventoryLabelID = InventoryLabel_custom.InventoryLabelID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( InventoryLabel.InventoryLabelID ${lessThanEqual} ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_InventoryLabel_MaxBaseID} ) AND ( ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_InventoryLabel_MinBaseID} ${lessThanEqual} InventoryLabel.InventoryLabelID )

SELECT InventoryLabel.InventoryLabelID, InventoryLabel.MachineStage, InventoryLabel.PartNumber, InventoryLabel.PartType, InventoryLabel.QuantityOrdered, InventoryLabel.WONumber, InventoryLabel.InventoryPackNo, InventoryLabel.CreatedFromDT, InventoryLabel.Quantity, InventoryLabel.Unit, InventoryLabel.Line, InventoryLabel.LabelTemplate, InventoryLabel.LabelsPerInventoryPack, InventoryLabel.ItemsPerLayer, InventoryLabel.LayersPerInventoryPack, InventoryLabel.PrinterURL, InventoryLabel.PrintedDT, InventoryLabel.ItemsPerInventoryPack, InventoryLabel.ScannedDT, InventoryLabel.IsCancelled, InventoryLabel.OrderQuantityPacks, InventoryLabel.LineShortName, InventoryLabel.PackNo, InventoryLabel.IsReprint, InventoryLabel.PartDescription, InventoryLabel.LabelSaveDirectory, InventoryLabel.JobID, InventoryLabel.IsPrintLandscape, InventoryLabel.NoCopies, InventoryLabel_.LabelColour, InventoryLabel_.EANCode, InventoryLabel_.CusNum, InventoryLabel_.PackingCode, InventoryLabel_.CustomerPartNo, InventoryLabel_.CustomerPartDescription, InventoryLabel_.LabelText1, InventoryLabel_.LabelText2, InventoryLabel_.LabelText3, InventoryLabel_.Customer, InventoryLabel_.Address1, InventoryLabel_.Address2, InventoryLabel_.City, InventoryLabel_.County, InventoryLabel_.PostCode, InventoryLabel_.Country, InventoryLabel_custom.InventoryPackID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM InventoryLabel FULL JOIN InventoryLabel_ ON (InventoryLabel.InventoryLabelID = InventoryLabel_.InventoryLabelID) FULL JOIN InventoryLabel_custom ON (InventoryLabel.InventoryLabelID = InventoryLabel_custom.InventoryLabelID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( InventoryLabel.InventoryLabelID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_InventoryLabel_MinDeltaID} )

SELECT InventoryLabel.InventoryLabelID, InventoryLabel.MachineStage, InventoryLabel.PartNumber, InventoryLabel.PartType, InventoryLabel.QuantityOrdered, InventoryLabel.WONumber, InventoryLabel.InventoryPackNo, InventoryLabel.CreatedFromDT, InventoryLabel.Quantity, InventoryLabel.Unit, InventoryLabel.Line, InventoryLabel.LabelTemplate, InventoryLabel.LabelsPerInventoryPack, InventoryLabel.ItemsPerLayer, InventoryLabel.LayersPerInventoryPack, InventoryLabel.PrinterURL, InventoryLabel.PrintedDT, InventoryLabel.ItemsPerInventoryPack, InventoryLabel.ScannedDT, InventoryLabel.IsCancelled, InventoryLabel.OrderQuantityPacks, InventoryLabel.LineShortName, InventoryLabel.PackNo, InventoryLabel.IsReprint, InventoryLabel.PartDescription, InventoryLabel.LabelSaveDirectory, InventoryLabel.JobID, InventoryLabel.IsPrintLandscape, InventoryLabel.NoCopies, InventoryLabel_.LabelColour, InventoryLabel_.EANCode, InventoryLabel_.CusNum, InventoryLabel_.PackingCode, InventoryLabel_.CustomerPartNo, InventoryLabel_.CustomerPartDescription, InventoryLabel_.LabelText1, InventoryLabel_.LabelText2, InventoryLabel_.LabelText3, InventoryLabel_.Customer, InventoryLabel_.Address1, InventoryLabel_.Address2, InventoryLabel_.City, InventoryLabel_.County, InventoryLabel_.PostCode, InventoryLabel_.Country, InventoryLabel_custom.InventoryPackID, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM InventoryLabel FULL JOIN InventoryLabel_ ON (InventoryLabel.InventoryLabelID = InventoryLabel_.InventoryLabelID) FULL JOIN InventoryLabel_custom ON (InventoryLabel.InventoryLabelID = InventoryLabel_custom.InventoryLabelID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS ) AND ( InventoryLabel.InventoryLabelID ${greaterThanEqual} ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_InventoryLabel_MinIncrementID} ) AND ( ${job_TOULOUSE_OWNER_InventoryLabel_MaxIncrementID} ${greaterThanEqual} InventoryLabel.InventoryLabelID )
